page.title: 15The Tillery Tigers
page.content: {An account written by Paul McCarte and {Andrew Bowd. We belong to the "Tillery Tigers" which is the local mini rugby club.Any one between the ages of 7and12 can join the club.We play up at Abertillery Park every Sunday.If it is tournament day we play from 9.00am to 3.30pm,if there is no tournament we play from 10.15am to 12.15pm.At Easter we played two tour matches against Gloucester which we won,4-0 and 16-4. At the end of the season we had a certificate and a trophy.In the local competions we reached the semi-final but were beaten by Abergavenny.We enjoy our rugby because it keeps us fit we would like to play flanker and forward prop for Wales.
